cause.description:
Were not affialited with party politics. We are with the people. We support all presidential candiates that will remove tropps from Iraq. Every penny, every vote and every signature counts. Invite your friends so we can complete our november 2008 goal of 20,000 Send All Donations To Felix Bernstein 215 west 92nd street Ap 5F New York, New York 10025
1. Remove Troops
2. Raise Support and Knowledge
3. Make $200,000 goal
cause.name: Peoples Cause For Leaving Iraq
